Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

The remains of this transport contain a salvageable energy pod worth: {STR_Rewards}. Unfortunately, its destroyed systems reveal no data on the convoy's origin, destination or what led to its destruction.
该运输器残骸中拥有可利用的能量舱，价值：{STR_Rewards}。很遗憾，由于系统损坏无法获得有关卫队来源、目的地或是被破坏原因的任何数据。
Dispatch from the Imperial Energy Complex
从帝国能量建筑群派遣而来

The logs are intact and it seems that this transport, carrying: {STR_Rewards} was dispatched from a nearby structure ({STR_ExploredStructure}) due to an unknown emergency. The location was added to the map.
从完整的记录日志中得知该运输器携带着：{STR_Rewards}，似乎是由于某个未知的紧急事件从附近建筑（{STR_ExploredStructure}）派遣而来。该地点已添加至地图。

This energy transport was part of a larger convoy before it was stopped in its tracks by an artillery strike. The wreckage contains a colony upgrade ({STR_BuildingName}) that we could salvage for use in one of our colonies.
在被炮火袭击前，这个能量运输器曾是大型卫队的一部分。残骸内装有殖民地升级（{STR_BuildingName}），我们可以将其回收并运用到其中一个殖民地中。
Add the colony upgrade ({STR_BuildingName}) as a free building to {STR_ColonyName}
将该殖民地升级（{STR_BuildingName}）免费添加至{STR_ColonyName}
释放核心中的电能，获得：{STR_Rewards}
This convoy seems to be the site of a failed Spacer raid. A skeleton in Spacer apparel was found inside the wreck, still clenching the valuable item ({STR_ItemName}) that led to its demise.
太空掠夺者似乎曾对这个卫队发起过袭击但却以失败告终。一具身穿太空掠夺者服饰的骸骨倒在废墟中，手中仍然紧握着那招致他死亡的宝贵物品（{STR_ItemName}）。

A lonely Autonom Sentinel is attempting to access the caches still sealed behind the convoy's reinforced doors. It seems unlikely that its efforts to break in will be successful anytime soon. [br/][productioncol]This decision will affect relations with this Faction.[/productioncol]
一个孤独的自主机械哨兵试图获得封锁在卫队强化门后的贮藏品，但短时间内破门而入对它来说似乎不太可能。[br/][productioncol]该决定将会影响你与该阵营的关系。[/productioncol]
You receive: {STR_Rewards}, and relations with the Autonom improve
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，同时与自主机械的关系提升
Loot the transport for yourself, gain: {STR_Rewards}
自行掠夺该运输器，获得：{STR_Rewards}
You receive: {STR_Rewards}, but relations with the Autonom decline
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，但与自主机械的关系下降

Next to the energy pods, we found a nearly depleted, but still intact unit ({STR_UnitName}). It appears to be unable to connect to its control hub, giving us a unique opportunity to use it for our cause.
我们在能量舱旁发现了一个能量几近枯竭但仍保留完好的单位（{STR_UnitName}）。它似乎无法与其控制中枢建立连接，这是推动我们事业发展的罕见机会。
Ignore it and loot the pods to get: {STR_Rewards}
无视哨兵并掠夺舱体，获得：{STR_Rewards}
Use the pods to power it up under your control
使用舱体为哨兵充能并让其服从你的控制
Use the pods to power up and free it. This will impact your reputation [goodalignment/]
使用舱体为哨兵充能并将其释放。这将影响你的声望[goodalignment/]

You find a lone Paragon Soldier on top of the energy pods, standing guard. The Soldier doesn't seem to pose any sort of threat, but he tells you that he is supposed to guard these for the Union's return. [br/][productioncol]This decision will affect relations with this Faction.[/productioncol]
你在能量舱顶部发现了一名完人士兵正守卫着这个舱体。这名士兵似乎并不会造成任何威胁，但他告诉你他会一直保护这些舱体直到星际联盟回来。[br/][productioncol]该决定将会影响你与该阵营的关系。[/productioncol]
You receive: {STR_Rewards}, and relations with the Paragon improve
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，同时与完人的关系提升
You receive: {STR_Rewards}, but relations with the Paragon decline
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，但与完人的关系下降
You find a salvageable Imperial supply reserve, containing: {STR_Rewards}. Unfortunately, the container logs are destroyed and you can't trace where the resources came from.
你发现了可回收的帝国补给贮藏，内含：{STR_Rewards}。遗憾的是，集装箱的记录日志已被摧毁，你无法追踪这些资源的来源。
You salvage: {STR_Rewards} from the Imperial supply stash. The logs reveal the coordinates of a location ({STR_ExploredStructure}), which seems to be the source of the stash's contents.
你从帝国补给贮藏中回收了：{STR_Rewards}。记录日志中标记着某个地点（{STR_ExploredStructure}）的坐标，那里似乎是这些供给的来源之地。

Within the containers, you find Biodome prefabs. We could transport these to one of our colonies and easily get a colony upgrade ({STR_BuildingName}), or we could simply take the supplies intended for starting the Biofarm.
你在集装箱内发现了生物穹顶的预装配件。我们可以将这些东西全部运到我们的殖民地中并轻松获得殖民地升级（{STR_BuildingName}），或者我们也可以只拿走这些用于开设生态农场的补给品。
Add the colony upgrade ({STR_BuildingName}) as a free building to {STR_ColonyName}
将该殖民地升级（{STR_BuildingName}）免费添加至{STR_ColonyName}
Ignore the colony upgrade prefabs and gain: {STR_Rewards}
无视殖民地升级预装配件，获得：{STR_Rewards}

As you are about to open the containers, a ragged fellow who looks like a Paragon recluse approaches you on a transport and shows you an item ({STR_ItemName}) as he points towards the container. Seems he wants to trade.
正当你要打开集装箱时，一名衣衫褴褛的完人隐士乘坐着运输器来到了你身边。他指了指集装箱并向你展示了一件物品（{STR_ItemName}），似乎是想要与你交易。
Trade the food for the item ({STR_ItemName})
Shoot him, gaining both. This will impact your reputation [anger/]
杀了他，将两者都占为己有。这将影响你的声望[anger/]

A small gang of Spacers approaches you. They ask for the contents of the cache because they are at risk of getting "pwned" if they return to the Scrapyard empty-handed. [br/][productioncol]This decision will affect relations with this Faction.[/productioncol]
一小群太空掠夺者向你走来。他们想要贮藏点里的东西，因为如果他们空手回到废品场的话，很有可能会被“摩擦”。[br/][productioncol]该决定将会影响你与该阵营的关系。[/productioncol]
You receive: {STR_Rewards}, and your relations with the Spacers improve
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，同时与太空掠夺者的关系提升
Loot the stash for yourself and gain: {STR_Rewards}
You receive: {STR_Rewards}, but your relations with the Spacers decline
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，但与太空掠夺者的关系下降

While opening the various containers, a malnourished Growth unit ({STR_UnitName}) scurries from inside one of them. It seems it has devoured the stash inside. However, there are still more containers to search.
在打开这些集装箱时候，一个营养不良的灵植单位（{STR_UnitName}）从其中一个集装箱里蹦了出来。它似乎吞噬了集装箱里的贮藏品，不过我们还有很多集装箱尚未搜索。
Feed it, making the unit ({STR_UnitName}) join you
喂食灵植，让该单位（{STR_UnitName}）加入你

A Growth Node can be seen making its way towards this location. It tells you that this cache is the perfect place to feed and grow some of the animals which the Growth have taken under their wing. [br/][productioncol]This decision will affect relations with this Faction.[/productioncol]
一个灵植节点朝这个地点而来，它告诉你这个贮藏点十分适合养育一些在灵植庇护下的动物。[br/][productioncol]该决定将会影响你与该阵营的关系。[/productioncol]
Grant them the site and gain: {STR_Rewards}
You receive: {STR_Rewards}, and relations with the Growth improve
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，同时与灵植的关系提升
You receive {STR_Rewards}, but relations with the Growth decline
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，但与灵植的关系下降

You find a transport containing a salvageable production stash. Unfortunately, the stash's systems are destroyed and provide no data on its origin, destination or the event that lead to its destruction.
你发现了一辆装有可回收产力贮藏的运输器。很遗憾，由于系统已经损坏，无法获得有关其来源、目的地或是被破坏原因的任何数据。
You salvage: {STR_Rewards}, from the stash. The logs show you the coordinates of a location ({STR_ExploredStructure}), which seems to be the source of the stash's contents.
你从贮藏中回收了：{STR_Rewards}。记录日志中标记着某个地点（{STR_ExploredStructure}）的坐标，那里似乎是这些贮藏品的来源之地。
Take the: {STR_Rewards}, and show the location

Within the crates and materials, you find that this convoy was transporting a colony upgrade ({STR_BuildingName}). We could potentially use the materials to assemble the structure in one of our colonies.
你在这些箱子和材料中发现这个卫队正在运输一种殖民地升级（{STR_BuildingName}）。我们可以用这些材料来组装我们的殖民地建筑。
Add the colony upgrade as a free building to {STR_ColonyName}
将该殖民地升级免费添加至{STR_ColonyName}

You discover that this transport was carrying blueprints and materials to make two different weapons. Unfortunately, you find that most materials have deteriorated over time and there is only enough left to manufacture one of the weapons.
你发现这个运输器上装有两种武器的蓝图和材料。很遗憾，大部分材料都因为时间太久已经坏掉了，剩下的材料只能制作出一种武器。

Spacers come rushing over to you, begging that you allow them to have the stash. They tell you their trucks are damaged and they need the parts to repair the glitch. [br/][productioncol]This decision will affect relations with this Faction.[/productioncol]
一些太空掠夺者急匆匆地向你走来，请求你能够把贮藏品让给他们。他们的货车坏了，需要这些部件才能修复车辆。[br/][productioncol]该决定将会影响你和该阵营的关系。[/productioncol]
Grant the Spacers the stash and gain: {STR_Rewards}
You receive: {STR_Rewards}, and your relations with the Spacers improve
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，同时与太空掠夺者的关系提升
Ignore them, loot the site for: {STR_Rewards}
无视他们，掠夺贮藏点并获得：{STR_Rewards}
You receive: {STR_Rewards}, but your relations with the Spacers decline
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，但与太空掠夺者的关系下降

A lone Paragon unit ({STR_UnitName}) is found slumped and weakened next to the stash. He tells you the Union left him to rot, and that he would gladly join you if you give him the implants he believes are inside the stash.
一个完人单位（{STR_UnitName}）正拖着虚弱的身躯倒在贮藏点旁。他说星际联盟抛弃了他，让他在这里自生自灭。他相信贮藏里有很多植入物，如果你能够将这些植入物拿给他，他会很乐意加入你。
Aid and allow the unit ({STR_UnitName}) to join us
帮助他并允许该单位（{STR_UnitName}）加入我们

As you prepare to acquire the stash, you receive a Paragon transmission. They explain that the materials you have found arrived on the planet illegally, and that they should be left alone for the Union to confiscate. [br/][productioncol]This decision will affect relations with this Faction.[/productioncol]
当你正准备拿走这些藏品时，你收到了一条完人传来的信息。他们解释称你找到的那些材料属于非法抵达这个星球的货物，应该放在原地等待联盟没收。[br/][productioncol]该决定将会影响你与该阵营的关系。[/productioncol]
Leave the materials behind and gain: {STR_Rewards}
You receive: {STR_Rewards}, and your relations with the Paragon improve
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，同时与完人的关系提升
The Union is not coming back - take: {STR_Rewards}
星际联盟不会回来的，带走：{STR_Rewards}
You receive: {STR_Rewards}, but your relations with the Paragon decline
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，同时与完人的关系下降
The remains of this research ship contain intact data pads. Unfortunately, they don't reveal any information about the vessel's mission and crew or the events that led to its crash landing.
研究船残骸中留有完整的数据板。很遗憾，这些数据并没有提及这艘飞船的任务、船员以及坠毁的原因。
You acquire: {STR_Rewards}, from the ship's data pads. The logs are still intact, showing you the coordinates to a location ({STR_ExploredStructure}).
你从研究船的数据板中获得：{STR_Rewards}。记录仍保存完整，并为你显示出了一个地点（{STR_ExploredStructure}）的坐标。

Within its wrecked hull, you find that this ship was transporting a colony upgrade ({STR_BuildingName}). We could assemble it at one of our bases, or study and dismantle it to gain insight into old Union architectures.
你在损坏的船体内部发现这艘飞船正在运输一种殖民地升级（{STR_BuildingName}）。我们可以在其中一个基地里进行组装，或是将其拆卸研究，从而进一步了解旧联盟的建筑。
Add the colony upgrade as a free building to {STR_ColonyName}
将该殖民地升级免费添加至{STR_ColonyName}

You find an intact item ({STR_ItemName}) inside the analytics and diagnostics chamber. We could keep the item, or we could activate the diagnostic protocols in order to study it, destroying the item in the process.
你在分析诊断室内找到了一件保存完整的物品（{STR_ItemName}）。我们可以带走这个物品，或是激活诊断协议对它进行研究，但会摧毁这个物品。

Research pertaining to the Void, including some samples, are found inside this ship, accompanied by a small Psi-Fish group. They seem interested in the contents of the ship, but you could alternatively use these samples to advance your own research. [br/][productioncol]This decision will affect relations with this Faction.[/productioncol]
我们在这艘飞船内发现了有关虚空的研究资料和部分样品，同时还发现了一小队灵能水母。它们似乎对飞船里的东西很感兴趣，不过你也可以用这些样本来推动你自己的研究。[br/][productioncol]这个决定将会影响你与该阵营的关系。[/productioncol]
Give the Psi-Fish the data logs and gain: {STR_Rewards}
把数据记录让给灵能水母，获得：{STR_Rewards}
You receive: {STR_Rewards}, and your relations with the Psi-Fish improve
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，同时与灵能水母的关系提升
You receive: {STR_Rewards}, but your relations with the Psi-Fish declines
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，同时与灵能水母的关系下降

Inside the vessel you find a Psi-Fish unit ({STR_UnitName}) trapped in a glass vat, unconscious. According to the ship's remaining logs, the machinery that is attached to the vat has the following functions:
你在飞船里发现了一个灵能水母单位（{STR_UnitName}），它被困在了一个玻璃缸内失去了知觉。根据留存下来的飞船记录，那台装配在玻璃缸上的机器具有以下功能：
Imprint: Release the unit ({STR_UnitName}) under your command
刻印：释放并控制该单位（{STR_UnitName}）
Flush: Free it to the wild. This will impact your reputation [happiness/]
冲洗：将它释放到野外。这将影响你的声望[happiness/]

Inside the crashed ship, you find an Autonom Monitor trying to access the data logs, but the security is proving troublesome. You could either help it or retrieve the logs for yourself. [br/][productioncol]This decision will affect relations with this Faction.[/productioncol]
你在坠毁的飞船内部发现一名自主机械监督者正尝试访问数据记录，但飞船的安全系统非常棘手。你可以帮助它，也可以独自拿走这些记录。[br/][productioncol]该决定将会影响你与该阵营的关系。[/productioncol]
You receive: {STR_Rewards}, and relations with the Autonom improve
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，同时与自主机械的关系提升
Ignore it and retrieve: {STR_Rewards}, for yourself
You receive: {STR_Rewards}, but relations with the Autonom decline
你获得：{STR_Rewards}，但与自主机械的关系下降
You find salvageable Cosmite[tricorium/] at this location.
你在这个地方找到了可利用的宇宙合金[tricorium/]。
You recently performed a good action.
你最近进行了一个善意行为。
You recently performed an evil action.
你最近进行了一个恶意行为。

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
